message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a great opportunity to get your hands on something really valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I think $120 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $110 for it.

I'm still willing to negotiate, but I need to make sure I get a good deal. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $122.50.
I'm getting close, but I'm still a bit short. I'm willing to pay $118 for the product.
I'm willing to meet you halfway again. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $120.50.
